name: Maple Nut Goodies
description: I wanted to make a mix that tasted like Brach's Maple Nut Goodies. This is a candy that my grandfather always had on hand and loved so I learned to love them as well. I think this mix comes pretty close. Mix it up and judge for yourself. If you do, please let me know how close you think I am.
author: mlNikon

reviews.text: The good news is you nailed it.  The bad news is that I had to go out and buy a bag of the candies just to be sure... my butt totally needed that lol.
